metadata.title: Subash Maharjan | Senior Frontend Developer
metadata.description: Subash Maharjan is a Senior Frontend Developer, experienced in creating beautiful and functional websites and web applications.

hero.paragraph: Passionate about coding, and making my client ideas come true.

aboutItems.name: Subash Maharjan
aboutItems.bioParagraph1: I'm a Senior Frontend Developer with 10+ years of experience building fast, scalable, and visually polished web applications — now enhanced with AI-powered features that drive smarter user experiences.
aboutItems.bioParagraph2: I specialize in modern frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue, with a deep focus on UI/UX design, performance optimization, and seamless usability. My recent work leverages AI tools and APIs to build more dynamic, personalized, and intelligent interfaces — from predictive components to conversational UIs and real-time insights.
aboutItems.bioParagraph3: I thrive on turning complex ideas into intuitive, high-impact digital products. Whether collaborating with startups or enterprise teams, I bring a mix of technical leadership, design thinking, and a future-forward mindset that helps teams innovate with confidence.

resume.resumeParagraph: You can check my resumé in the link below.
